TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFormatProvider

summary.span: 提供用于检索控制格式化的对象的机制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for retrieving an object to control formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供格式设置和分析操作中提供格式设置信息的对象。The interface supplies an object that provides formatting information for formatting and parsing operations. 格式设置操作将一种类型的值转换为该值的字符串表示形式。Formatting operations convert the value of a type to the string representation of that value. 典型的格式设置方法是`ToString`类型的方法，以及。Typical formatting methods are the `ToString` methods of a type, as well as . 分析操作将一个值的字符串表示形式转换为具有该值的类型。Parsing operations convert the string representation of a value to a type with that value. 典型的分析方法包括`Parse`和`TryParse`。Typical parsing methods are `Parse` and `TryParse`. 接口包含一个方法， 。The interface consists of a single method, . 是一个回调方法： 分析或格式设置方法调用它，并将其传递表示的格式设置或分析方法需要的对象类型的对象将提供格式设置信息。 is a callback method: The parsing or formatting method calls it and passes it a object that represents the type of object that the formatting or parsing method expects will provide formatting information. 方法负责返回该类型的对象。The method is responsible for returning an object of that type. 实现常用隐式的格式设置和分析方法。 implementations are often used implicitly by formatting and parsing methods. 例如，方法隐式使用实现，它表示系统的当前区域性。For example, the method implicitly uses an implementation that represents the system's current culture. 实现也可以指定显式由具有的类型参数的方法，如和。 implementations can also be specified explicitly by methods that have a parameter of type , such as and . .NET Framework 包括以下三个预定义的实现，以提供区域性特定格式设置或分析数字和日期和时间值中使用的信息：The .NET Framework includes the following three predefined implementations to provide culture-specific information that is used in formatting or parsing numeric and date and time values: - 类，该类提供信息用于格式化数字，如货币、 千位分隔符和特定区域性的小数分隔符符号。The class, which provides information that is used to format numbers, such as the currency, thousands separator, and decimal separator symbols for a particular culture. 了解如何识别的预定义的格式字符串对象，并在数字格式设置操作中使用，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).For information about the predefined format strings recognized by a object and used in numeric formatting operations, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 类，该类提供用于设置日期和时间，例如特定区域性或顺序和日期的年、 月和日部分的格式的日期和时间分隔符符号格式的信息。The class, which provides information that is used to format dates and times, such as the date and time separator symbols for a particular culture or the order and format of a date's year, month, and day components. 了解如何识别的预定义的格式字符串对象，并在数字格式设置操作中使用，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).For information about the predefined format strings recognized by a object and used in numeric formatting operations, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 类，该类表示特定区域性。The class, which represents a particular culture. 其方法返回区域性特定或对象，具体取决于是否对象使用的格式设置或分析涉及数字或日期和时间的操作中。Its method returns a culture-specific or object, depending on whether the object is used in a formatting or parsing operation that involves numbers or dates and times. .NET Framework 还支持自定义格式设置。The .NET Framework also supports custom formatting. 这通常涉及到创建的格式设置类的同时实现和。This typically involves the creation of a formatting class that implements both and . 此类的实例然后作为参数传递给执行自定义格式设置操作，如方法示例说明了此类设置为 12 位数字的帐号数字格式的自定义实现。An instance of this class is then passed as a parameter to a method that performs a custom formatting operation, such as The example provides an illustration of such a custom implementation that formats a number as a 12-digit account number. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现可以更改的日期和时间值的表示形式。The following example illustrates how an implementation can change the representation of a date and time value. 在这种情况下，单个日期显示通过使用代表四个不同区域的对象。In this case, a single date is displayed by using objects that represent four different cultures. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/provider2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/provider2.vb#3)] 下面的示例演示如何实现的类使用接口和方法。The following example illustrates the use of a class that implements the interface and the method. `AcctNumberFormat`类将值，该值表示设置格式的 12 位帐号帐号。The `AcctNumberFormat` class converts an value that represents an account number to a formatted 12-digit account number. 其`GetFormat`方法返回对当前的引用`AcctNumberFormat`实例如果`formatType`参数引用实现的类; 否则为`GetFormat`返回`null`。Its `GetFormat` method returns a reference to the current `AcctNumberFormat` instance if the `formatType` parameter refers to a class that implements ; otherwise, `GetFormat` returns `null`. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/Provider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/Provider.vb#2)] 实现的类然后可以调用的格式设置和分析操作中使用。The class that implements can then be used in a call to a formatting and parsing operation. 例如，下面的代码调用方法生成一个字符串，包含格式化的 12 位帐号。For example, the following code calls the method to generate a string that contains a formatted 12-digit account number. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/Provider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/Provider.vb#1)]

related.span: 设置 .NET 中类型的格式
如何：定义和使用自定义数值格式提供程序

span.span: How to: Define and Use Custom Numeric Format Providers

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetFormat(class System.Type formatType) cil managed
Public Function GetFormat (formatType As Type) As Object

param.name: formatType
param.span: 一个对象，该对象指定要返回的格式对象的类型。

span.span: An object that specifies the type of format object to return.

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象为指定类型提供格式设置服务。

span.span: Returns an object that provides formatting services for the specified type.

returns.span: 如果 实现能够提供该类型的对象，则为 所指定对象的实例；否则为 。

span.span: An instance of the object specified by , if the implementation can supply that type of object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是格式设置和分析方法调用来检索的分析操作或在格式设置操作的输出字符串的格式中的输入字符串的格式信息的回调方法。 is a callback method that formatting and parsing methods invoke to retrieve information about the format of the input string in parsing operations or the format of the output string in formatting operations. 在`formatType`参数、 格式设置或分析方法传递的对象执行其操作所需的类型。In the `formatType` parameter, the formatting or parsing method passes the type of object it requires to perform its operation. 如果实现可提供该格式设置或分析对象，则返回该对象。If the implementation can supply this formatting or parsing object, it returns that object. 如果不是，它返回`null`。If not, it returns `null`. 例如，在调用方法，该方法的参数是提供有关当前整数实例的字符串表示形式可能格式设置信息的对象。For example, in the call to the method, the method argument is an object that provides information about how the string representation of the current integer instance might be formatted. 当运行时执行该方法时，它将调用对象的方法并将其传递对象，表示类型。When the runtime executes the method, it calls the object's method and passes it a object that represents the type. 如果对象可以提供对象，它将返回该对象。If the object can supply a object, it returns that object. 如果它不能提供该类型的对象，它将返回`null`。If it cannot supply an object of that type, it returns `null`. 您可以实现接口和中提供自定义格式设置或分析服务的类的方法。You can implement the interface and the method in classes that provide custom formatting or parsing services. 实现然后作为参数传递给了解析或格式设置方法的类型的参数的任何重载，如， ，或。The implementation is then passed as an argument to any overload of a parsing or formatting method that has a parameter of type , such as , , or . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现的类使用接口和方法。The following example illustrates the use of a class that implements the interface and the method. `AcctNumberFormat`类将值，该值表示设置格式的 12 位帐号帐号。The `AcctNumberFormat` class converts an value that represents an account number to a formatted 12-digit account number. 其`GetFormat`方法返回到其自身的引用，如果`formatType`参数引用实现的类; 否则为`GetFormat`返回`null`。Its `GetFormat` method returns a reference to itself if the `formatType` parameter refers to a class that implements ; otherwise, `GetFormat` returns `null`. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/Provider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/Provider.vb#2)] 实例`AcctNumberFormat`类向方法提供格式设置或分析服务，然后传递作为参数。An instance of the `AcctNumberFormat` class can then be passed as an argument to a method that provides formatting or parsing services. 例如，下面的代码传递`AcctNumberFormat`类来方法生成格式化的 12 位帐号。For example, the following code passes an `AcctNumberFormat` class to the method to generate a formatted 12-digit account number. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/Provider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/Provider.vb#1)]
